entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
